attributes.action: Allow all NHS patients and visitors to sick patients, to have free facilities to park their vehicles in the NHS car parks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As tax payers we have bought the NHS, so why should we have to pay for the privilege to get treatment, or to visit family and friends in the hospital.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
